name: Alpha Fish
description: The Alpha Fish is a large aquatic beast known for its formidable presence in underwater habitats. It has a robust body, sharp fins, and an aggressive demeanor, ready to defend its territory.
memorable: Its ability to frighten opponents with a Fin Flare makes it a unique aquatic predator.
goals: Predominantly hunts and defends its territory against perceived threats.
relations: Could be found alongside other aquatic predators or as part of an underwater ecosystem.
environment: Typically found in underwater locales such as deep rivers, lakes, or oceans.
strengths: Great endurance due to high hit points and strong melee attacks.
weaknesses: Low intelligence makes it easily fooled and susceptible to illusions.
attacks: Utilizes a Multiattack featuring a Fin Flare for area effect and two headbutt attacks for direct melee damage.
most_powerful_ability: Fin Flare frightens creatures within 30 feet, potentially limiting their actions if they fail their saving throws.
senses: Possesses passive perception of 13, which allows it to be aware of its surroundings.
skills: Skilled in intimidation, making it a threatening presence even in combat.
additional_information: Can make a headbutt attack as a bonus action when wounded.
Appears larger due to its Frightening Display ability.
Attacks indiscriminately due to the Too Aggressive trait.
